name: exotic-industries-K2
title: Exotic Industries - Krastorio 2 compatibility
author: VELTAX, Ulincsys
description: Legacy mod for EI < 0.6.0 compatibility with K2. Patched for late-game consistency, and with additional bug-fixes. Original description: Exotic Industries & Krastorio 2 Compatibility integrates the advanced technologies and intricate production chains of Exotic Industries with the expansive and immersive gameplay enhancements of Krastorio 2.
